properties.Title: Drinking Water Alert For The Village Of Buena Vista
properties.Summary:
Description: Village of Buena Vista has experienced a Watermain Break which has resulted in loss of Water for the entire Village of Buena Vista. Staff and Contractors are working on repairs.
Expires: 2019-08-22T14:00:00-06:00
Originated from CAP Alert: SK Regina Beach and Buena Vista, 2019-08-21T17:03:03-06:00, 9DFD872B-793D-628D-4E05-4AE7126954C4
Area: Village of Buena Vista
properties.Author: SK Regina Beach and Buena Vista

properties.Title: Severe Thunderstorm Warning In Effect
properties.Summary:
Description: At 7:43 a.m. MDT, Environment Canada meteorologists are tracking a severe thunderstorm capable of producing very strong wind gusts and up to nickel size hail. This thunderstorm is located 30 km northeast of Milk River and is moving to the northeast at 50 km/h. ### Large hail can damage property and cause injury. Locally heavy rain is also possible. Severe thunderstorm warnings are issued when imminent or occurring thunderstorms are likely to produce or are producing one or more of the following: large hail, damaging winds, torrential rainfall.
Expires: 2019-08-22T16:42:16-00:00
Originated from CAP Alert: Environment Canada, 2019-08-22T13:44:16-00:00, urn:oid:2.49.0.1.124.1587945444.2019
Area: M.D. of Taber near Grassy Lake and Hwys 877 and 513, Co. of Warner near Wrentham, Co. of Forty Mile near Skiff, Co. of Forty Mile near Foremost
properties.Author: Environment Canada
